definitions.definition: A convulsive fit of coughing or laughter; a sonorous indraft of breath; a whoop; a gasp of breath caused by laughing, coughing, or crying.
To gasp for breath as in a severe fit of coughing.
A tight curl, twist, or bend in a length of thin material, hair etc.
definitions.example: We couldn't get enough water to put out the fire because of a kink in the hose.

definitions.definition: A difficulty or flaw that is likely to impede operation, as in a plan or system.
definitions.example: They had planned to open another shop downtown, but their plan had a few kinks.

definitions.definition: An unreasonable notion; a crotchet; a whim; a caprice.
Peculiarity or deviation in sexual behaviour or taste.
A positive 1-soliton solution to the Sineâ€“Gordon equation
To form a kink or twist.
To be formed into a kink or twist.
